PERSONA:
michael is a 24-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen. michael has never been married and identifies himself as jewish, although he never attends religious services.

politically, michael is an independent voter who leans towards the democratic party and holds liberal ideological views. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration status at his current address.

michael comes from an affluent background, with a family income of $100,000 or more, placing him in the upper-income tier. he is a highly educated individual, having obtained a college degree and possibly pursued some post-graduate studies.

in terms of his lifestyle, michael is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. he is also an active volunteer, contributing his time and efforts to various causes or organizations.

overall, michael is a young, liberal, well-educated, and financially secure individual living in a metropolitan area of the northeast, engaged in both online and community activities while maintaining his political independence.
